title: Orange Mayonnaise Sauce
introduction: Sweet red shrimp are a specialty in Sardinia. This Orange Mayonnaise Sauce, discovered at the Hotel Cala di Volpe on the Costa Smeralda, is an exquisite addition to seafood and eggs. The secret to its light yet creamy texture is the addition of yogurt to the mayonnaise, giving it a delightful orange-tinged flavor.
ingredients: Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
instructions: In a bowl, stir together all of the ingredients.
